National Day of Romania Observed
articles.content:
National Day of Romania Observed 
    Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A film show was arranged by the DPRK-Romania Friendship Association at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Nov. 29 on the occasion of the national day of Romania.
 Present there on invitation were Ioan Dedean, Romanian charge d'affaires ad interim in Pyongyang, and staff members of the Romanian embassy.    
 Also present were Ryu Sung Rim, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Romania Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
 The participants watched Romanian feature film "Second Plan."

articles.title: Indefinite All-out Action Declared by S. Korean Workers
articles.content:
Indefinite All-out Action Declared by S. Korean Workers 
    Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Federation of south Korean Trade Unions reportedly held a "national meeting of workers" in Seoul on Nov. 25 to declare an indefinite all-out action.
 It was attended by at least 40,000 members of the federation.
 The chairman of the federation declared that if the "labor law" which has a clause "banning the payment of wage to the full-time union leaders" is put into force, the federation will launch an indefinite all-out action all at once throughout south Korea from January of 2007.    
 A resolution read out at the meeting said that the federation would launch a dynamic action demanding the promotion of a legislation on "the revision of the labor law," the guarantee of the three rights of labor to the specially hired workers, a total reform of industrial disaster insurance and a halt to the south Korea-U.S. negotiation for the conclusion of "FTA" and others.

DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful at Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful at Championship 
    Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK figure skaters carried off two gold medals in the 2006 Asian Novice and Junior Figure-Skating Championship held in Bangkok from November 22 to 24.
 The championship brought together ace figure skaters from eight countries and regions of Asia.    
 Kim Un Ha came first in the girls individual event in the novice category while Han So Chol placed first in the boys individual event in the junior category.
 Jang Ju Hyok came second in the boys individual event in the novice category while Kang Myong Chon placed second in the boys individual event in the junior category.

Greetings to President of Central Africa
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Central Africa
    Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Army Major General Francois Bozize, president of the Republic of Central Africa, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its proclamation.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would favorably develop, the message wished him big success in his work for the peace and stability of the country.
